entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
